problems.title: Longest Common Prefix
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an array of strings, find the longest common prefix string amongst them.
If there is no common prefix, return an empty string "".

Return the longest common prefix.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3
flower flow flight

Sample Output
fl

Explanation:
"fl" is the longest common prefix.

Sample Input
3
dog racecar car

Sample Output


Explanation:
There is no common prefix.
problems.constraints:
1 <= N <= 200
0 <= |S| <= 200
Strings consist of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Compare the first and last strings after sorting.
